title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones - Like New
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones. Used only for 2 months, in perfect condition. Includes original case, cables, and box. Amazing sound quality and 30-hour battery life.

title: Nintendo Switch OLED + 5 Games Bundle
description: Nintendo Switch OLED in white, excellent condition. Comes with Zelda TOTK, Mario Kart 8, Animal Crossing, Smash Bros, and Pokemon Scarlet. All games are physical copies. Extra Joy-Con included.

title: Canon EOS R50 Mirrorless Camera Kit
description: Nearly new Canon EOS R50 with 18-45mm lens kit. Perfect for content creators and photography beginners. Includes extra battery, 64GB SD card, and camera bag. Only 500 shutter count.

title: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro High - Chicago
description: Brand new, deadstock Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Chicago' colorway. Size US 10. Never worn, with original box and receipt. A timeless classic sneaker.

title: Keychron Q1 Pro Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium wireless mechanical keyboard with Gateron Pro Brown switches. QMK/VIA compatible for full customization. Includes extra keycaps set and coiled cable. Barely used.

title: DJI Mini 3 Drone - Fly More Combo
description: Compact drone perfect for travel and beginners. Fly More Combo includes 3 batteries, charging hub, and carrying case. 4K HDR video, 38-min flight time. Registered and ready to fly.

title: Vintage Levi's 501 Denim Jacket - 1980s
description: Authentic vintage Levi's 501 denim jacket from the 1980s. Great fade and patina. Size Medium. Classic American style that never goes out of fashion.

title: iPad Air M1 64GB + Apple Pencil 2
description: iPad Air with M1 chip in Space Gray. 64GB WiFi model with Apple Pencil 2nd generation. Perfect for students and artists. Includes Magic Keyboard case. Light scratches on back.

title: Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine
description: Semi-automatic espresso machine with built-in grinder. Makes cafe-quality espresso at home. Includes tamper, milk jug, and cleaning kit. Used for 6 months, well maintained.

title: Complete Pokemon Card Collection - Vintage
description: Collection of 200+ Pokemon cards from Base Set, Jungle, and Fossil. Includes 3 holographic rares. All cards are in protective sleeves. Great for collectors or nostalgic millennials.

title: Herman Miller Aeron Chair - Size B
description: Ergonomic office chair, the gold standard for comfort. Size B (medium), graphite color. Fully loaded with lumbar support and adjustable arms. Some wear on armrests, otherwise excellent.

title: Kindle Paperwhite + 50 eBooks Collection
description: Latest Kindle Paperwhite with 6.8" display and warm light. Includes 50 pre-loaded classic literature eBooks. Perfect for book lovers. Fabric cover included.

title: Fjallraven Kanken Backpack - Navy Blue
description: Classic Fjallraven Kanken backpack in navy blue. Brand new with tags. Durable and water-resistant, perfect for everyday carry or school. Timeless Scandinavian design.

title: Sonos One SL Speaker Pair - White
description: Two Sonos One SL speakers in white, perfect for stereo setup. Rich, room-filling sound. Works with any Sonos system. Like new condition, selling as a pair.

title: Settlers of Catan + All Expansions Bundle
description: Complete Settlers of Catan collection including base game and all 5 expansions. Seafarers, Cities & Knights, Traders & Barbarians, Explorers & Pirates, and Legend. Perfect for board game nights.
